name: [Fastly] Abnormal bandwidth being sent for service: {{service.name}}
query: avg(last_4h):anomalies(avg:fastly.bandwidth{*} by {service}, 'agile', 2, direction='both', interval=60, alert_window='last_15m', seasonality='weekly', timezone='utc', count_default_zero='true') >= 1
message:
The average bandwidth being sent from all Fastly caches is at {{value}}, which is out of its usual range. Sudden spikes in bandwidth could either be good (organic traffic increase), or bad (malicious actors trying to increase your system load with a high number of Get requests).

To help troubleshoot:

- Ensure that <https://status.fastly.com/> is all green
- Check the Fastly Dashboard: https://app.datadoghq.com/dash/integration/43/fastly---overview
